thread.section_title: Hotel Square Louvois - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel, great location
thread.title_full: Great hotel, great location - Review of Hotel Square Louvois, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah T
title: Great hotel, great location
text: We stayed for two nights at this hotel in January. Great value for money. The hotel is very well presented, and the rooms are equipped with coffee making facilities, a mini bar and bathrobes. The staff are very helpful, even helped my partner surprise me with flowers on my birthday. Location is great as well, very close to the Louvre and lots of cafes and restaurants. Would definitely return to this hotel.
